meanings.definition: The quality of being honest and straightforward in attitude and speech.
meanings.sent1: Her candidness in admitting her mistake impressed everyone.
meanings.sent2: I appreciate your candidness in sharing your thoughts with me.
meanings.sent3: His candidness about his fear of spiders made us all laugh.
meanings.sent4: The candidness of the child's innocence was like a refreshing breeze.
meanings.sent5: The politician's lack of candidness raised suspicions among the voters.

meanings.definition: The state or quality of being open and sincere in expression.
meanings.sent1: The teacher's candidness in discussing difficult topics made the students feel comfortable.
meanings.sent2: I admire her candidness in expressing her emotions without hesitation.
meanings.sent3: The candidness of the puppy's excitement over the new toy was contagious.
meanings.sent4: The candidness of the sunrise painted the sky with vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: His candidness in sharing his dreams inspired others to do the same.
